body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Mart Solutions. My name is Kenneth Garcia. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kenneth, my name is Margaret Ross.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Margaret. Can I kindly ask for your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's at five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Margaret. Is there anything specific you are looking for in terms of inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm excited to see the new car models available. I'm looking for something fuel-efficient and spacious.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have some great options that match your preferences. Thank you for considering Car Mart Solutions, Margaret. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Kenneth, for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Margaret. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
